version_description: Incorporating user feedback in this release.
Incorporating user feedback in this release.
Incorporating user feedback in this release.

Welcome to Paytm Money on iOS 12! Look out for Auto fill magic when you login on your iOS 12 devices :)

1. Optimized the CPU and battery utilization of the app for smoother app experience
2. Major enhancements for 32 bit devices - thanks for the feedback!
3. Know your KYC verification status after you skip the wait list queue

We hear your feedback loud and clear, please keep ’em coming at ios.feedback@paytmmoney.com

We have improved a bunch of features for better performance and an enhanced investing experience.
Keep the feedback and suggestions coming, we are working on new features as requested by you.

The next update will be some SIRIous fun ;) . Stay tuned!

We heard you! Now bookmark schemes under watchlist for easy browsing and seeing the recently viewed mutual funds quickly :)

With Siri shortcuts, view your portfolio & track your upcoming SIPs instantly. We would love to know which other shortcuts would you like Siri to help you with.

New in Profile:
Manage your Auto-pay Mandates
Goals have a new home
Change your email and mobile number under Communications to receive updates from Paytm Money

Ring in the new year with these awesome features for a financially fitter 2019 :)

Introducing Import Portfolio!
Now track all your external mutual fund investments by importing your CAS (consolidated account statement) in the app

New Siri Shortcuts - You can ask Siri to send any of these statements:
- ELSS Tax Statement
- Portfolio Statement
- Investment Insights

Also, payments via UPI - Experience faster & seamless investing using UPI

Ring in the new year with these awesome features for a financially fitter 2019 :)

Introducing Import Portfolio!
Now track all your external mutual fund investments by importing your CAS (consolidated account statement) in the app

New Siri Shortcuts - You can ask Siri to send any of these statements:
- ELSS Tax Statement
- Portfolio Statement
- Investment Insights

Also, payments via UPI - Experience faster & seamless investing using UPI

Ring in the new year with these awesome features for a financially fitter 2019 :)

Introducing Import Portfolio!
Now track all your external mutual fund investments by importing your CAS (consolidated account statement) in the app

New Siri Shortcuts - You can ask Siri to send any of these statements:
- ELSS Tax Statement
- Portfolio Statement
- Investment Insights

Also, payments via UPI - Experience faster & seamless investing using UPI

- New AMCs: 7 new fund houses added with a total of 32 AMCs now live covering 94% of the industry AUM
- Import Portfolio: Tracking all external mutual fund investments by importing CAS (consolidated account statement) is now live
- Siri Shortcut: Just ask Siri to send your tax statement & use it as an investment proof while filing taxes
- Faster KYC: Now open your Paytm Money investment account & get KYC verified within 30 minutes to start investing the very same day!

- New AMCs: 7 new fund houses added with a total of 32 AMCs now live covering 94% of the industry AUM
- Import Portfolio: Tracking all external mutual fund investments by importing CAS (consolidated account statement) is now live
- Siri Shortcut: Just ask Siri to send your tax statement & use it as an investment proof while filing taxes
- Faster KYC: Now open your Paytm Money investment account & get KYC verified within 30 minutes to start investing the very same day!

- New AMCs: 7 new fund houses added with a total of 32 AMCs now live covering 94% of the industry AUM
- Import Portfolio: Tracking all external mutual fund investments by importing CAS (consolidated account statement) is now live
- Siri Shortcut: Just ask Siri to send your tax statement & use it as an investment proof while filing taxes
- Faster KYC: Now open your Paytm Money investment account & get KYC verified within 30 minutes to start investing the very same day!

1. More power & more convenience to you to manage your SIPs even better
a. Register Now, Pay Later: Register your SIP today & make payment on the same day or at a later scheduled SIP date
b. SIP Top-up: If you wish to increase your SIP amount for any scheme, top up your SIP anytime easily

2. Now, check status of your in-progress transactions straight from the Portfolio screen

3. Historical ratings for schemes added for to give you a complete view of the scheme rating performance

4. Your Portfolio now shows details about multiple folios of a scheme

Hope you love using these enhancements as much as we did building for you :)

Introducing Paytm Money Investment Pack!
If you are new to mutual fund investing or still deciding on which mutual fund scheme to invest in then this is the ideal solution for you :)

What is Investment Pack?
A handpicked investment solution created by our in-house advisory team to cater to your investment needs.

How does it help?
- Ideal for long term wealth creation
- Suits your risk profile
- Allows periodic review and re-balancing of your portfolio

Is it Free?
Yes! Well, there's no free lunch but we believe in making investing accessible for all. Investment Pack is absolutely free for you :)

We look forward to your experience with Investment Pack

Appraisal time special!
Bringing to you portfolio top-up - to make the most of your increment in the fastest way :)

Invest your incremental salary in same schemes of your current portfolio in one-click by simply topping up your portfolio.
Update the app & explore this feature under 'My Portfolio'

Revamped App UI with a few 'sleek' surprises to make your investments process smoother :)

Appraisal time special - to make the most of your increment in fastest way! Invest your incremental salary easily in same schemes of your current portfolio in one-click by simply topping up your portfolio.

Explore this feature under 'My Portfolio'.

Explore this feature under 'My Portfolio'.

Revamped App UI with a few 'sleek' surprises to make your investments process smoother :)

Appraisal time special - to make the most of your increment in fastest way! Invest your incremental salary easily in same schemes of your current portfolio in one-click by simply topping up your portfolio.

Explore this feature under 'My Portfolio'.

Making fund discovery easy & fun:

1. Category Winners: Find schemes with proven track record by returns & future potential.

2. List of Index Funds: Unlike actively managed funds, these funds create a portfolio that simply copies the given index (NIFTY or SENSEX) thereby delivering similar returns as per index. Lower expense ratio is it's USP!

3. Spotlight: Illuminating the list of funds categorized by AMCs, Fund Managers & more.

4. We have also added a notification settings which will make it easy for you to choose what you want to receive from Paytm Money. You have been asking and we are always ears.

5. For the first time in India you can Invest in any of the 40 AMCs in India through Paytm Money.

Good things take time & we are super excited to bring these for you:

Smart Switch - Been juggling with investments via multiple platforms? Paying huge commissions with investments in regular mutual funds? Now, simply Switch all your mutual fund investments to Paytm Money. Upload your CAS to initiate the Switch in minutes.

Know your AMC & Fund Manager better : Watch engaging & insightful videos of AMCs, Listen to Fund Managers speaking about markets, their managed funds & more. All of these in the revamped AMC sections

Instant AutoPay via Net Banking - Now scheduling payments for SIPs is super fast & simple. Request for autopay setup using your netbanking credentials, activation done within 3-7 working days. Available for 21 banks currently

We are super excited for iOS 13 as much as you are. In line with that we bring to you the Paytm Money app in an absolutely brand new avatar. Switch to dark mode in your device and enjoy the browsing and investing experience even more.

What else is added?

1] Launching New Fund Offers (NFO): Invest in NFO of any AMC directly from the app. View upcoming NFOs & subscribe to them easily
2] Flexible Multi SIPs - Now start a new SIP of same or different amount in the same folio & mutual fund scheme
3] Delete old bank accounts - You can now delete your old bank account mapped to your account & retain the default bank account for continued investing

We have worked hard to ensure that the app will be blazing fast in this version!

Personalised Me Tab - Me tab with personalised notifications that will help you to make better investment decisions.

Enhanced Search - Get access to Popular searches, AMC Pages & Investment Packs with our updated search feature.

New to Mutual Funds, We're here to help - Now it is even easier for first time investors and you can choose from investment packs from AMCs & Paytm Money.

What's new?
Launching National Pension Scheme ( NPS ) on Paytm Money

Plan your retirement and Save ₹15,600/- via investment in Tier 1 NPS Tax Saving Accounts

Invest in Tier II Anytime withdrawal NPS Accounts and redeem the investments anytime you want
